properties.areaDesc: Lake St. Clair Open Lake (U.S. Portion); Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape MI
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 9 at 9:35PM EST until January 12 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 25 knots from the
southwest with gusts up to 39 knots. The largest significant
waves will be 3 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 4
feet.

* WHERE...In Lake St Clair, Lake St Clair. In Lake Erie,
Michigan Waters of Lake Erie from Detroit River to North Cape
MI.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 7 AM EST Sunday
with the largest waves expected around 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
